response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, with its worth estimated at $15,000. Considering its quality and rarity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents a remarkable saving of $1,000 compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for discerning buyers like yourself. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow you to enjoy all the benefits this product has to offer. Should you require any further information or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know promptly. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
